summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4722 for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from West Armour Street to West Dravus Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54643, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
